long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CGPA Calculator for BMSCE

Effortless CGPA Calculation for BMSCE Students

Tired of manually calculating your CGPA from results.bmsce.in? This Chrome extension simplifies the process, providing you with your SGPA and CGPA instantly.

How to Use:

Enter Subject Counts: Input the number of subjects you've taken for each credit category (1 credit, 2 credits, 3 credits, 4 credits) into the corresponding text boxes.
Verify Credits: The extension will automatically display the total credits based on your input. Confirm that they match your academic record.
Calculate: Click the "Calculate" button, and your SGPA will be displayed prominently.

Features:

Accurate Calculation: Ensures precise calculation of your SGPA and CGPA based on the official grading scheme.
User-Friendly Interface: The extension's simple design makes it easy to use, even for those who aren't tech-savvy.
Time-Saving: Eliminates the need for manual calculations, saving you valuable time and effort.
Secure: Your data remains private and is not stored or shared by the extension.
Convenient Access: Access your CGPA anytime, anywhere, directly from your browser.
Note: This extension is designed specifically for BMSCE students and works exclusively with the results.bmsce.in website.

Disclaimer: While every effort is made to ensure accuracy, please double-check your results with your official academic records.

Developed by PJ & SV :D
